name: Rate Limited
description:
Made by two people as their first real game for the Mini Jam 101: Limit

The theme was 'Limit' and the limitation was 'Control the Environment'.

You wanted to sit down and watch your favorite YouTube videos, but your 6 other siblings are using all of the bandwidth! Figure out all sorts of ways to stop your siblings from using the Wi-Fi in this witty Point and Click "puzzle" game!

.

.

Hint for Green Room
